meta.article_title: August 6, 2012 - The Feel of Good Technique

feel-good-technique.probleme: Remembering the feel of a good stroke

debutant.description: Remember the feel of a good stroke and try to repeat it

exercices_complementaires.description: Remember a particular practice session or match where the feel was just right, and regularly use that memory to get the proper feel back

metriques_progression.description: Watch your level improve through regular practice and repetition

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Forgetting the feel of a good stroke
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Regularly practice and repeat the feel of a good stroke to maintain and improve skills
